long_description: Chesapeake boasts 4,600 miles of tidal shoreline; find dozens of trips along the shore, in the Bay proper and in its tributaries. Authors: Michael Savario and Andrea Nolan. Softcover; 216 pages; black-and-white photographs; maps. Backcountry Guides; copyright 2003. Covers day trips on the tidal tributaries and coastlines of the Western and Eastern shore. Trip descriptions include important information on put-ins and take-outs, winds and currents, equipment, paddling techniques and safety issues. Informative sidebars enliven instruction on topics such as salt marsh ecology, wildlife, and social and maritime history. Crucial information on low-impact paddling techniques, hypo/hyperthermia awareness and many other paddling-related topics.
short_description: Chesapeake boasts 4,600 miles of tidal shoreline; find dozens of trips along the shore, in the Bay proper and in its tributaries.
